Source.Name: partclone
Source.Summary: Partclone provides utilities to save and restore used blocks on a partition.
Source.Description: Partclone provides utilities to save and restore used blocks on a partition and is designed for higher compatibility of the file system by using existing libraries, e.g. e2fslibs is used to read and write the ext2 partition.

Package.Name: partclone
Package.Summary: Partclone provides utilities to save and restore used blocks on a partition.
Package.Description: Partclone provides utilities to save and restore used blocks on a partition and is designed for higher compatibility of the file system by using existing libraries, e.g. e2fslibs is used to read and write the ext2 partition.
